=Goal=
The goal is to create a set of performance test applications for the Android Platform.
You can get benchmarking application from the Downloads section

==How to install==
Here is example if you want to add this on your SD Card:

 # mount sdcard
 # put RowboatBench-v1.0-for-2%2B.apk to sdcard/data/app
 # sync
 # unmount

or

 # Get connection with target via ADB
 # adb install RowboatBench-v1.0-for-2%2B.apk

==How to run?==
Running on the device: Open Applications menu and start RowboatBench

==Tests==

The following tests included:
 * 2D graphics:
   # Archs
   # Fill Rate
   # Circles
   # Rectangles
   # Bitmap Animation
   # Text

 * 3D graphics:
   # Colored Cube
   # Lighting
   # Textures
   # AlphaBlending
   # glFog
   # Reflection effect
   # Multitexturing
   # Utah teapot
   # GlxGears
   # Stars
   # Sphere mapping
   # Bezier surface

 * CPU:
   # Dhrystone
   # Whitestone
   # Himeno
   # Spectral normalization
